April 13 (Reuters) - J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC:: *J.P. MORGAN SEC PLC AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - PROPOSED PLACING OF SHARES IN AIRTEL AFRICA PLC *J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC - HAS BEEN APPOINTED BY INSTITUTIONAL SELLER TO SELL ABOUT 50 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES IN AIRTEL AFRICA PLC *J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC - PRICE PER PLACING SHARE WILL BE DETERMINED THROUGH AN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD PROCESS


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 13-APR-202115:36:07 GMT
